mapper.select: select post_no as postNo, post_title as postTitle, date_format(post_createdate, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as postCreatedate from post where category_no = (select category_no from category where user_id = #{userId} order by category_no limit 1) and post_status = 'true' order by postCreatedate desc limit 10

select post.post_no as postNo, post.post_title as postTitle, post.post_contents as postContents, date_format(post.post_createdate, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as postCreatedate, post.category_no as categoryNo, blog.user_id as userId from post, category, blog where post_no = #{postNo} and post.category_no = category.category_no and category.user_id = blog.user_id
mapper.update: update category set post_count = post_count + 1 where category_no = #{categoryNo}
update category set post_count = post_count - 1 where category_no = #{categoryNo}
